parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: ID of the Alibaba Cloud primary account. No need to set this parameter as it will be deprecated soon.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Used to ensure the idempotence of requests. This parameter value should be generated by the client, ensuring uniqueness across different requests. The maximum length is 64 ASCII characters, and the value must not contain non-ASCII characters.

parameters.name: MigrationJobId
parameters.description: Data migration instance ID, which can be queried by calling the DescribeMigrationJobs interface.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the data migration instance is located. For more details, please refer to the [list of supported regions](~~141033~~).
